alert.note: Alert for Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Newton County Higher Elevations; Newton County Lower Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 3:52PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Searcy and southeastern Newton Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 352 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Dillen, or 18 miles south of Jasper, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eula... Carver... Piercetown... Bass... Cowell... Vendor... Lurton... Mt Judea... Deer... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for north central Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Newton County Higher Elevations; Newton County Lower Elevations
